item.title: Maureen Polo Named CEO of Hello Sunshine, Sarah Harden Moves Into Advisory Role
item.description: Polo joined the Reese Witherspoon-founded company in 2022 as head of direct-to-consumer.

item.title: Reese Witherspoon’s Hello Sunshine CEO Shake-Up: Maureen Polo Takes Helm as Sarah Harden to Exit
item.description: Hello Sunshine, the media company founded by Reese Witherspoon, is switching up CEOs. Maureen Polo, previously head of direct-to-consumer at Hello Sunshine, has been named CEO. She succeeds Sarah Hard

item.title: Reese Witherspoon’s Hello Sunshine CEO Shake-Up: Maureen Polo Takes Helm as Sarah Harden to Exit
item.description: Hello Sunshine, the media company founded by Reese Witherspoon, is switching up CEOs. Maureen Polo, previously head of direct-to-consumer at Hello Sunshine, has been named CEO. She succeeds Sarah Hard
